snippet: Significant discounts on the Nissan Leaf, Chevrolet Volt and other advanced-powertrain vehicles are making high gas prices easier to bear for some Californians.

headline.main: In California, High Gas Prices and Incentives for Fuel-Efficient Cars Go Hand in Hand
